summary: Create a website mirroring the content of precisionlasernw.com, rebranded under the company name "Built Rite Creations".

existing_features.title: Recreate a public marketing website whose page structure, sections, and written content match the current content found on https://precisionlasernw.com, but with the company name changed everywhere to "Built Rite Creations".

Implement the recreated site as a responsive, accessible UI (mobile/tablet/desktop) with working navigation between pages/sections and sensible SEO defaults (document titles per page and a global meta description).

Apply a cohesive visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) that fits a construction/woodworking/industrial craftsmanship brand for "Built Rite Creations" and use it consistently across the entire site (avoid default-looking template styling).

new_feature_requests.summary: Build a website with the same content as precisionlasernw.com, changing the company name to Built Rite Creations
